text: When we go to a bookstore, where do we usually find books arranged vertically and stored in columns for browsing?
When we visit a bookstore, which section of the store can we find books that are arranged vertically and stored in columns to facilitate browsing?
Where in a bookstore would we typically find books arranged vertically and displayed in columns to facilitate browsing?
When visiting a bookstore, where would one typically find books arranged vertically and displayed in columns for browsing?
When we visit a bookstore, where do we typically find books arranged vertically and stored in columns for browsing?
When we visit a bookstore, where can we typically find books stored in vertical columns for browsing and selection?
